website_summaries.verdict: For fast results and a natural-looking tan that fades evenly over the body, St. Moriz is a quality choice.
pros: If you're impatient, you will love the instant gratification that comes with St. Moriz
You see the tan right away
We also like how the tan fades evenly, never leaving one part of the body darker than the others
cons: Product does rub off on clothes a little
We recommend wearing an old T-shirt when applying

customer_reviews.title: Loveee
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly obsessed with this. I've tanned three times now and still have half the bottle left. The color is natural and genuine, not orange. Haven't had problems with streaking thus far. Makes my face too dark if I leave it on my face for too long but that's easily solved. Fades kinda quick, but fades evenly. For the price it can't be beat. I'm veryyyy pale and the dark works great on my skin. I included a before and after pic of my legs
customer_reviews.author: Haley P

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great tanning product that doesn't turn you orange! Definitely has a green undertone but it's a rich, dark color which looks awesome even oin my super fair skin. You'll need to shower after it sets for a few hours, but not because you're sticky or stinky, but because it will "run" if you sweat or get wet (pool, ocean, etc.) and you'll be streaky! Overall super pleased with this stuff. Definitely use the application mit to avoid funky colored hands!
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Anders

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product at an excellent price. Just as good as St. Tropez at a fraction of the cost. I ordered Medium and was sent Dark, but I actually think I prefer the dark (I'm naturally neon white). I love the fact that there's temporary bronzer in it so I can see where I've applied the product already. The bronzer does make it seem darker than it really is, but it rinses right off upon your first shower.
customer_reviews.author: Mightywink

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not orange, goes on nice.
customer_reviews.text: I'm only doing 4 stars because it had leaked in the package. As for the product, I LOVE it. I am always so worried about orange streaky gross self tans and this was none of those. It goes on nice with the mitt, soaks up quickly so it doesn't stain and is a nice brown. Picture is after one application.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiDee

customer_reviews.title: Even application and lasts
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty surprised to actually like this since I have had zero luck with sunless tanners. Felt like it took a little while longer to ship and I think it came from England which I was surprised with ( Im in Florida). Gives you a nice even application that actually lasts about 2-3 days. I think next time I will order the lighter one as dark was a tiny bit much for me.
customer_reviews.author: JPL2770

customer_reviews.title: Natural color, not orange
customer_reviews.text: The color this tanner provides is beautiful and very natural looking. I had to take away stars because after using for 2-3 days my chest and shoulders started to break out really bad. I'm sure there is nothing wrong with the product but it just did not agree with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: D Roper

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome self tanner I love the way this turns out, just make sure you shake it quite a bit before use. Exfoliate and shave before use as well and it should turn out great! Last about a week and fades great!
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best Tanner Ever
customer_reviews.text: The mitt is really flimsy. But if you have itty bitty hands it might last longer for you. I have Hagrid-sized hands and destroyed two mitts in no time. No other mitt has been that bad. The foam, on the other hand, is the best self-tanner I've ever used. It's basically streak-proof, has the perfect color, and lasts several days as long as you moisturize. I've used St. Moritz for years and I always get compliments! And when you're a middle-aged chunky broad that is pretty awesome! 😊 Goodbye varicose veins and cellulite!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CallieGirl86

customer_reviews.title: Very good but make sure it is stored in the fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good color and easy to apply. It's not necessary "instant" because it takes about 6-8 hours to dye your skin but I'd have to say the color is great and comes out even. Best if used before bed then rinse it off in the shower in the morning. I am very white due to my red hair so the dark is perfect. It's not orange at all. Cons: If you leave it out for too many months it will turn green. To curb this just place it in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: New formula
customer_reviews.text: If you’re an old user of this product and are rediscovering it, they have changed the original formula! It still works, and is a great value for the price, but the undertones are more of a warm brown color/orange (not in a bad way) than an olive tan. The mitt is decent! Remember to keep the product in a climate controlled setting!! It will separate and go all wonky if it’s left in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Herty

customer_reviews.title: Great color, tricky application
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color payoff on this self tanner, you can instantly see a difference and it gradually darkens over time too! If you’re not experienced with using the mitt or how to use streakier tanners this one may be tricky though. The mitt always wants to come off my hand, making application uneven or difficult. I’d recommend maybe using the actual glove kind!
customer_reviews.author: heykimbo

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty color!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Probably a little dark for my very pale skin. But it was easy to apply and blend. Got a little help from my husband. Gave me a lot of confidence on our summer trip. Good color, not too orange, but not muddy either.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with your knees and elbows it will make them look blotchy
customer_reviews.text: This is a Tanner it's not as dark as you think it is but it does give you one natural looking tan if you use like a light codes. But I would follow the instructions that it tells you on the bottle to exfoliate You No Shave moisturize and then put it on. But it is a very good product for your price it does last a pretty good while like you could have it for about 3 to 2 months which is really nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: rachel lindsey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST self tanner I have used. I am very fair. I have tried multiple brands over the years and this by far is the best. You know exactly where you're putting it and if you have missed a spot. It dries very fast. No over powering perfume smell. It does get the usual self tanning smell a few hours later but it is not strong. I rinsed in the AM as suggested and the tan is so beautiful. LOVE IT!!! Life long user from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Freda Moss

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I am super impressed with this stuff. I have never really had such a nice and realistic looking glow from a bottle. I have tried many, cheap and expensive and this is by far the best in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My skin tone is porcelain. I am incredibly pale. I bought this in dark and I absolutely love the color it gives me. Doesnt look fake, looks very natural. Never double applied only had to use 1 coat but very nice. If your in the US I reccomend buying in advance of an event or outing you plan on looking tan to because it take almost 2 weeks to arrive. Other than the time it takes to get to you it's an awesome product. Doesnt smell like nasty self tanners either.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this product again
customer_reviews.text: For the price this product is very good. I’m a red head so this product did me justice. It was a very natural tan in my opinion and the mitt made it 100 times easier. The only thing I don’t like is how when you go to wash it off the next morning most of the product comes off, which I didn’t like but maybe you would. I would also recommend moisturizing your body after using it. Even the days when you don’t. The tan lasted for me about 4-6 days or so.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Best fake tan, so natural!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using St. Moriz for a few years after deciding I didnt want to spend twice for St. Tropez. I am of Swedish/Irish/Norweigan/Scottish heritage so I am naturally a bit on the paler side. I generally turn orange with self tanners. I got the dark shade. My tan looks natural, not orange at all. Its so easy to apply with the mit. The dye does look a bit streaky but I promise once you wash it off, the final color is not streaky.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: I like the color and ease of application
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and ease of application, but you really have to be careful with this formula as it really can be messy and it stains... everything. Even after taking a shower I have dripped red tinted water on my bath mat. Other than that, it's really a nice color self tanner and applying it with the glove is a cinch.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Leigh

customer_reviews.title: but this stuff is great! Watch a YouTube video on how to apply ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably don’t need to say again since everyone who uses this knows, but this stuff is great! Watch a YouTube video on how to apply foam self tanner, and you will learn all you need to know about creating the perfect tan!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Luzier

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product after a friend recommended it. First time I used it, it was a great turnout. I was so pale from quarantine and haven't been able to get outside and tan. I wasn't fully exfoliated, slept overnight, worked out the next morning and then showered. The color was perfect. The second time I tried I put it on after the shower and didn't get as much color. Make sure your skin is completely fry before applying. I've never had streaks or anything. It does not get on clothes or sheets. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Best ever self tanner
customer_reviews.text: Best tanner ever! Seriously! I've been buying a self tanner for more than double the price that works less as awesome as this! I'm super Irish white, and this made me look like I've been on a tropical vacation in less than 24 hours. I was skeptical but seeing is believing!! Will be buying this again! I applied it about 3-4 days ago and this is what it looks like after a couple showers and long bath!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this brand! A very reasonable price for self tanner and it turns out well. Make sure if you're a first timer to get the glove, a body butter lotion for barriers (hands, feet, knees etc) and watch some tutorials for the best results. I'm a fan and I'll keep using this over the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: FatKidMafia007

customer_reviews.title: Brings out imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Instead of coverage. This product actually brought out the color of a birth mark that I had was trying to even up. I am an brown woman I was hoping to even put my skin tone with this product. I guess you get what you pay for. I will have to try something with more coverage
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: This product is Awesome, I used it once and it lasted almost ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is Awesome, I used it once and it lasted almost a week it was the perfect color. Did not turn orange. I would recommend this to anyone that does not tan or anyone who just wants color. I even used it on my face, I did mix it with my face lotion so that it would not be as dark, but it really is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Terri R

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. I usually use ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I usually use loving tan and was looking for a cheaper option. I am a redhead with fair skin, this barely added any color to my skin even after leaving it on for 10 hours. Isn't blotchy, but definitely isn't "dark"
customer_reviews.author: Torri Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tan
customer_reviews.text: I am White!! with red hair. Like I glow in the dark white. This tan was natural and last 5 full days. I like it better than St. Topaz and Bondi sands. Its crazy good and the price makes it totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesi Earley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last and mostly washes off after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: Dried my skin, and made me itchy all over. I personally think it’s not dark enough (just my preference) I have to do 2 coats to get it to where it’s decent. It also DOES NOT last. 3 days tops. The only pro is that it hardly has a scent... i am a frequent self tanner and this isn’t really up to my standards.... but i think if you are new to self tanning this might work ok for you as a beginner. Would I buy it again? No. Is it ok? Eh maybe 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Win Win
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this product. This is my first experience in using fake Tanner and I have had no trouble putting it on. Looks natural and lasts really well.
customer_reviews.author: mcooper24

customer_reviews.title: Great working self-tanner; believable, easy to apply, minimal streaking, cheaper than St. Tropez!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this brand to me; and I love it! I'm very fair-skinned and don't want to get cancer by tanning outside. I am able to apply this tanner once every 2 weeks for a nice, natural-looking tan. Does not leave my skin dry or dyed a weird color. The bottle smells good, too. I've used St. Tropez or years; but I am happy to switch to St. Moriz!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Big ol dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: Well I received this package very quickly but I received a huge mess when I got it. The bottle leaked everywhere and I was very afraid to use the small remaining amount since it had been exposed to air. I might try this again and update my review but right now I am way too dissapointed to purchase again. I have used the glove however with my other self tanner (LovingTan) and it has ripped after 2 uses. The price was definitely to good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat this self tanner for the price!! Gives me a nice dark tan & it lasts for days with exfoliation & moisturizing after each shower. I’ve bought countless bottles of this & would choose it over even the most expensive brands! It’s super easy to apply, dries fast, and doesn’t make you smell like ramen noodles. Would definitely recommend 😊
customer_reviews.author: Elise Pendley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this more than using a spray or lotion. This also shows color quickly if you need some color for an event or night out.
customer_reviews.author: Tierra

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt make me look orange
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color! I have fair skin I ordered the dark and I think it gives me a nice natural looking tan. Love this product will definitely be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: vickie rumbold

customer_reviews.title: Great product- go with a different mitt
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fantastic!! The mitt however is very thin and flimsy so I would suggest purchasing a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Waters

customer_reviews.title: orangey
customer_reviews.text: This stuff goes on pretty orange and doesn't last too long. Even when you shave and exfoliate well prior to application. It smells pretty chemically and doesn't ever really dry down. The tacky feeling lasts until you wash it off, and then youre unable to get the smell to go away for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing self Tanner! Perfect brown, easy to apply and doesn't have to be reapplied every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: best self tan
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five stars if they would've sent me what I ordered. The product itself does deserve five stars because its one of the best self tanners I've ever used, and I have used them all for many years. I loved the pretty tan it gave me, but I ordered it in dark and when it got to me it was medium. The color lasts pretty well, I highly recommend it and will keep repurchasing it, hopefully my next purchase will be the actual shade I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: I keep coming back to this one
customer_reviews.text: Its simply the best self tanner I've ever used. I think it even works better than my st.tropez tanner which I paid $40 for. It doesn't have a weird tint, smell, or odd texture. My tan lasts about 4 days and it is so easy to apply, dries quick, that I can apply again without much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good tanner
customer_reviews.text: Comparable to my other high-end tanners. This solution works really well, and doesn’t make you appear orangey at all like other cheaper tanners. The tanning mitt lasted me about a year before it ripped on the side seams. I’d recommend for anyone looking for a cheap self tanner!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Buy in person instead
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought this product at ulna before, and it worked perfectly. This one from amazon was streaky, didnt go on well at all even with the mitt. My advise, go to ulta instead. Great product just dont get it from here. My guess is its expired
customer_reviews.author: Cbarnes

customer_reviews.title: Works for pale skin!
customer_reviews.text: I used st tropez for years, but the price so high i decided to switch to St Moriz. It works so well and never gets streaky or weird looking on my very pale skin. Such an awesome product, I will continue to buy for years!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great!! I am still learning and new to the self tanning world but this comes out very pretty once you get the hang of how to put it on! I let my sister use it also and she loved it too
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high expectations due to the low price.......however this stuff is really great. Nice bronze color and works very nice for a mouse. Really exfoliate before using this....it will stick to any dry patches.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: love love this tanner! I wish it lasted longer, but all around it's amazing. the color is perfect + it's so easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Perry

customer_reviews.title: Am happy with it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It doesn't dry out my skin and it's easy to use, but I feel like all my color rinses off when I rinse off the guide color even if I sleep on it and keep it on 8+ hrs. However if you later it you'll get a good color payoff but then you're running out faster.
customer_reviews.author: lynncraft86

customer_reviews.title: Best self tanner
customer_reviews.text: I tried out so many self-tanners and I found one affordable, no ompaloopa skin. But on the other hand it lasts for 2 weeks. Great formula. I’m have real skin colour but very faint so I look like my brother’s skin tone. I even got compliments from friends asking me, “Did you go somewhere warm”. I feel amazing! Thanks St Moriz
customer_reviews.author: Shih-Yin ✡️

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is really good stuff....it looks natural, easy to apply and stay on good
customer_reviews.author: cathy sowell

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this stuff! It is so easy to put on. It does not streak (if you let it dry properly) and it looks amazing on! I am not a fan of most self tanners but this is the only one I use!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with the glove, doesn’t have you turn orange and lasts for a few days. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Best undertone
customer_reviews.text: wish I could find a tan to stick to my legs. Love this undertone, not orange at all, and it fades nicely
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.stokes

customer_reviews.title: This is a must! Just be careful it gets pretty dark.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying this product out and I really liked it. The only thing I will say is that it breaks my face out :( so I have to use a different one for my face. But other than that I love it! I would repurchase. It gets me so dark!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: absolutely loved this product. It gave me the most natural tan I could ask for and I used it for my prom it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Neira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tan
customer_reviews.text: Best self tanner I have ever used and I've tried plenty. Usually self tanners are pretty smelly, but this one had a clean smell to it. Almost like soap. I'm really pale and ordered the dark and it came out looking really natural. If you want a darker tan just rinse the bronzer off (after at least 6 hours) and reapply. I'll be ordering more after I finish my bottle. Highly recommend adding the application glove as it creates an even and streak free tan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but leaked upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and normally purchase through a different retailer, however due to COVID19 I had to purchase through amazon. Same product, however upon delivery, the product had leaked and made a huge mess when unwrapping the package. Otherwise, would recommend the product itself!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Will repurchase over and over
customer_reviews.text: I love this fake tan. It’s reasonably priced and works. I’m naturally very pale and I got the dark color, it doesn’t make me orange either. Mine lasts around 3-4 days. It’s easy to apply especially with the mitt it comes with. It also doesn’t smell super bad like most fake tanners!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Haste

customer_reviews.title: Dark and natural
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I normally do spray tans but wanted something to use at home and I love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: The Family

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tanner, great price been using for years no mix with lotion to get a lighter color and better more even blend. The mit is very cheap to me tho, but it’s ok for starting off.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the mail and it was busted and leaked all over not happy about that one bit!!! I do use this product works amazing but very disappointing when you buy something and this is how it was shipped...
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Domenighini

customer_reviews.title: Great product and color
customer_reviews.text: Great product and color. I actually like it better that st tropez which is way more expensive than this product. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best tan
customer_reviews.text: Theses tanner is the best self tanner I have ever used! No streaks and gives amazing color!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stabile

customer_reviews.title: If you plan on shaving your legs...stay away
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a dupe for my St. Tropez Dark Mousse (it's expensive!). This was not it. The color was good, but it all washed off in the shower the next day. I did another coat the next night, and it looked much better...until I shaved my legs - and it got HORRIBLY SPLOTCHY. My St. Tropez doesn't do that. (I'm fair skinned and a long time self tanner user.) I really wanted to like this since it got good reviews...maybe mine was fake or old?
customer_reviews.author: M Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sent me something different than I ordered. I order what the picture showed which I have used before and like a lot. Got sent the instant tan not the dark and it dies not work the same and has a strong order to it! Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: awesome price on both products and quality of the tanning mousse is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!!!!!! I have fair skin so it takes forever for me to tan. But one use of this and I can skip the tanning bed and have tan I've always desired without burning. It didn't streak at all and looked natural. I highly recommend this product you won't regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tammy blair

customer_reviews.title: Not for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: Hello i wasnt happy it made me streak have brown spots and left my pores brown or dark . It was my first time i did as the directions said. Its still patchy on my body its been almost a couple weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Avila

customer_reviews.title: My favorite self tanner
customer_reviews.text: Love this not streaky as long as you apply it evenly. I’m pretty pale and it gives me a nice bronze tan, not orange! Love the application mit it came with it makes it soo much easier and goes on very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Gimpert

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking tan
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking tan, not too orange or anything. It only lasts about 3 days though and as it washes off it leaves your knees looking a bit weird. Has that normal tanner smell, with an extra hint of caramel. For the price I like this tanner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a decent product at a good price the only downfall is the tan does not ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent product at a good price the only downfall is the tan does not last. Max it last about 2 days then really reallly fades out
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect alternative! Good color
customer_reviews.text: I used to use st tropez but it was so expensive. This is a perfect alternative! Good color. Applies easily.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite tanners. It’s not orange at all. Please come out with a tanner with no color guard. I just hate staining my sheets.
customer_reviews.author: shahalie

customer_reviews.title: but the mousse is great. So nice to be able to get that ...
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this product. Worked well. The glove def doesn't last, but the mousse is great. So nice to be able to get that touch of sun without having to A)look fake and B)sit out for hours under the rays.
customer_reviews.author: J Bollo

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I was always skeptical about self tanners but decided to give it a try. I loved this product! It didnt leave me orange or streaky (which I was afraid of) It gave me a nice even bronze color. I would definitely recommend it for a beginner like myself,its very easy to use. I just wish it would last a bit longer. My tan lasted about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Keila H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Streaky and orange! Used once and never would use again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped mitt!
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived and I was so excited to use it until I noticed my mitt came DAMAGED which makes this product unusable! The whole front was ripped /unattached... I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bruntz

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to, natural looking easy to use and great price
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Totten

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: Like the color of the tan however you definitely need to let dry thoroughly and if you wait to rinse the color indicator off the next morning be sure to fully cover where you applied or you will have tan sheets.
customer_reviews.author: ashcraft31

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST SELF TANNER
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a much more expensive self tanner that didn't work as well or smell as nice as this one! From now on the only self tanner I will buy and use is St. Moriz, it's the best and absolutely well priced!
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Kunin

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!!! Has much more coverage than what I was using previously. The mitt is very soft and applies the tan evenly. The mitt is velvet so it doesn’t absorb all the product .
customer_reviews.author: prestin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Made me look like I have a natural tan.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Downey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love it 😻 it’s really cool Color and easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Kseniia Миронова

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Tan But...
customer_reviews.text: It makes an lovely realistic looking tan, but it does not last long. Three days later and it is all worn off.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: great smell great price
customer_reviews.text: ammaaazing natural color i am fair skinned and this gets me dark without looking fake at all! great smell great price! THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Kettle

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a beautiful tan but comes off relatively quickly
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a beautiful tan but comes off relatively quickly.... would need to be applied every 3-4 days. Overall would buy again!🤩💘
customer_reviews.author: kirsten brownell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this self tanner! It looks natural and stays for a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bordine

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks very natural and looks great! Also you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Saige Magee

customer_reviews.title: Natural.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self tanner ever. Very easy to apply. Looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L. Elfert

customer_reviews.title: I'm VERY fair and this creates a perfect, natural looking tan instantly for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm VERY fair and this creates a perfect, natural looking tan instantly for me. I would recommend applying this in pretty thin layers though, as it can go a bit clumpy and too dark if I apply it in thick layers.
customer_reviews.author: testerbailey

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and looks natural!
customer_reviews.text: This came out beautifully on my skin! One application made me noticeable a few shades darker. Didn't look orange at all and there are no streaks! Looks very natural and real. The glove also works well and is cute! Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will repurchase!
customer_reviews.text: Getting lots of compliments on my tan! Use it once a week and it gives me a lasting, even color.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Love this product. Buildable. Can be drying to skin.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a subtle tan. Looks more natural than other products I have used. I'm very fair complexed and love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyndale Honey

customer_reviews.title: ... over 5 days at extreme sweating conditions) and applies beautifully, free of streaks
customer_reviews.text: It is long lasting (i've had it for over 5 days at extreme sweating conditions) and applies beautifully, free of streaks. I noticed a little orange tint to it on the first day but it faded away by the the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but i don't like how it fades out
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but i don't like how it fades out, it peels out and i have to rub it off hard in the shower in other to take it off my skin
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: smells STRONG - you have to use it at bedtime and then shower the next morning (i would anyway! lol!) - bc the scent (though pleasant) is just REALLY powerful. it smells like tanner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 Girls

customer_reviews.title: ... my skin so moisturise a lot but it applys beautifully its not patchy at all
customer_reviews.text: It drys out my skin so moisturise a lot but it applys beautifully its not patchy at all. You do meed to exfoliate very well before applying or elese you will get random dark spots where you have patches of dry skin.and this doesnt make my face break out i do have sensitve skin... I rate it 10 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: Super natural
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I am very fair skinned and this still looks very natural on my but still very tan not Orange.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Rebadow

customer_reviews.title: Orange
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I’m too pale but it turned my skin orange 😢
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple uses tan came out GREEN. Not even half way through the bottle. Application is hard and streaky. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect self tanning foam!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first self tanning foam I have ever used and I will never use another!!! Does not leave me orange or streaky! I put it on at night right before bed and then wash it off in the morning and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Nichole Kitchens

customer_reviews.title: Great product! But Diff. Style of mitt delivered
customer_reviews.text: Great product, came new and sealed. Tanning mitt was different design which was a little disappointing but was new and sealed in package. Overall great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

product_meta.title: St Moriz Instant Self Tanning Mousse 200ml - Dark With St Moriz Tanning Mitt
product_meta.description: St. Moriz Instant Self Tanning Mousse, has been specially developed with ingredient which help to create an instant bronzing effect, providing you with a perfect, all over, professional tan. Suitable for all skin types. Inlcudes St Moriz tanning mitt.
feature_bullets: Moriz Instant Self Tanning Mousse, has been specially developed with ingredient which help to create an instant bronzing effect, providing you with a perfect, all over, professional tan
